metadata.title: CVE-2023-28484 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
In libxml2 before 2.10.4, parsing of certain invalid XSD schemas can lead to a NULL pointer dereference and subsequently a segfault. This occurs in xmlSchemaFixupComplexType in xmlschemas.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-28484` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxml2 - 2.9.14+dfsg-1ubuntu0.2
libxml2-utils - 2.9.14+dfsg-1ubuntu0.2
python3-libxml2 - 2.9.14+dfsg-1ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxml2 package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.9.14+dfsg-1ubuntu0.2').
